## Func.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Func` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(run: (args: T) => Surd, args: T, symbol?: string, argSymbols?: string[]);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                                    | Description                                                              |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| run        | (args: T) =&gt; [Surd](./surds.surd.md) | Function                                                                 |
| args       | T                                       | Arbitrary array of surd arguments for function                           |
| symbol     | string                                  | Symbol for function (default: <code>&quot;f&quot;</code> for "f(x)")     |
| argSymbols | string\[\]                              | Symbols for arguments (default: <code>[&quot;x&quot;]</code> for "f(x)") |
